extendedInfo.description: Your friend said WHAT?!  Play Friend Factor and find out more about your friends than you ever thought you would! Would your friend rather be married to Batman or Iron Man? What would your brother do if he had the ability to read minds? Would your best friend ever go out with your ex?Guess how your friends would answer a variety of outlandish questions and see if you REALLY know them!GAME FEATURES:- GET 1000s of outrageous questions to test how well you know your friends (and how well they know you!)- UNCOVER surprising things about people you thought you knew - WATCH THE RANKS and see who your top friends are - QUESTION PACKS with like Girlfriend/Boyfriend, Inside Jokes, and more let you play in different ways - MAJORITY RULES play against the world and see if you can guess what most people would sayContact Support: QuizHelp@crowdstar.com

reviews.title: Email response
reviews.comment: I sent an email to see why everyone keeps getting the 503 service error. Yes, it has been taken offline. But at least take off the application from Google Play if it has been taken offline. Why was it been taken offline anyway? Please don\'t leave everyone like this. Your simply losing people by doing so.
reviews.author: Aoki Lapis

reviews.title: **WARNING**
reviews.comment: **DO NOT INSTALL, THERES NO GAME. Devs r unresponsive.  DONT WASTE YOUR TIME LIKE I DID. LEARN FROM ME, LOL..seriously tho don\'t install this its just a white screen with an error msg.
reviews.author: Felipe Mendoza

reviews.title: Fun but could use a couple things
reviews.comment: Fun game to pass the time with friends and family. The ranking system, however, is flawed. It gauges who knows who best based on the number of correct answers as opposed to the percentage of answers guessed correctly. So if you start a game with someone new they\'re never going to \"know you\" as well as someone you\'ve been playing with for a while. Also I dont get notifications on my android when its my turn.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes or does nothing a lot
reviews.comment: I love this game a lot, however, it often does nothing when i tap something and i have to wait until the game restarts on its on.  it needs push notifications via phone, not via fb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement!
reviews.comment: I use to enjoy this app a lot I would get on it daily, but recently this white screen pops up saying 503 Service Unavailable and that No Server Is Available To Handle This Request. I don\'t know what happen but I plan on to uninstall
reviews.author: Emmanuel Santos

reviews.title: I am Seriously annoyed
reviews.comment: I can\'t even get into the game any more. It just keeps saying that my password changed. I type the password in.  It works.  I press go to play, and I am back at Facebook/email!!!
reviews.author: Rylee Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Great concept but...
reviews.comment: I really think you have a great concept but I dont have friends that play this game...i think this game would be fantastic and your other users would enjoy better also if you could play with random users... then you\'d have a five star app! :)
reviews.author: Kristina Gayler

reviews.title: Fun, needs fixing
reviews.comment: Though being fairly fun it has a lot of needed fixes. The send notification function doesn\'t actually give notification. it doesn\'t update very quickly. Some questions have answers that are too similar. Some questions have odd wording that makes them hard to follow. (The use of they and them too often.) The ads will be invisible since the last update so I end up clicking the big full screen ones while trying to load up a game. Same happens with the exit game window. The sound on/off setting resets randomly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really great concept.
reviews.comment: This game would be five stars if the could fix the glitches and allow in game messaging.  Sometimes I want to remark on a question after it is played!  But overall super fun and entertaining!
reviews.author: Marisa Keener

reviews.comment: Game was awesome... But now it\'s not working AT ALL! Did it get deleted? :/
reviews.author: Kayla Carroll

reviews.title: friend factor review
reviews.comment: i love the idea of this game so much, and i like the questions. but the game either doesn\'t load past the front screen or takes over 2 minutes to actually load the game. it also has not let me go past round 1 in either of my games with different people. the arrow at the bottom to go to the next round doesn\'t work or register. so i have only been able to go through one round with my friends.  please add notifications, make it load faster, and let me go past the first round !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: My friends wont play with me because there are no android push notifications.  Fix it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Notifications
reviews.comment: Its a fun game, but it would be great to have a notification up top when the game isnt open so you know its youe turn.
reviews.author: Brittany Aguiar

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Was a lot of fun but the same 503 white unavailable screen keeps popping up :( to bad bcus I rly liked it
reviews.author: Jayce Dempsey

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Overall, not bad; but it needs a notification option other than Facebook, a different reward/scoring scale like 1 if wrong 3 if right and maybe something extra for 3 or 5 in a row. And I have to login to Facebook every time I restart the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Used to be great, now you can\'t even use it!
reviews.author: Bronte Rice

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This is a really fun game to play with friends when you have spare time, but like everyone else is saying it needs notifications. Also as a suggestion a category that lets us write our own questions and answers would be pretty cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it! BUT..
reviews.comment: There needs to be an update soon to be able to get notifications and also it needs to be faster. And maybe more categories. Oh and to get more coins when we get it right..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but.....
reviews.comment: I like to play it.....when it works. Alot of the time it jus lags or stays on the same screen all the time. Fix those problems and it would be great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Close to being awesome
reviews.comment: But overall just made soooo poorly. Bad UI, freezes, notifications still don\'t work, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User
